briefTitle: Diffusion Weighted Magnetic Resonance Imaging of the Breast During Chemotherapy: Response Evaluation
officialTitle: Diffusion Weighted Magnetic Resonance Imaging of the Breast During Chemotherapy: Response Evaluation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* core biopsy with diagnosis of breast cancer
* start of neo-adjuvant chemotherapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* magnetic resonance imaging incompatibility
